name: Anytime Fitness
address: Anytime Fitness, 7643 Royal Oak Ave, Burnaby, BC V5J 4K2

featured_reviews.review_id: Visiting from California and we needed a place to workout daily. Found this gym nearby and just 5 mins walking distance. This is a great small, but mighty gym. Friendly staff, clean and well maintained equipments. Thank you Sam and John for your friendly and professional service.
featured_reviews.review_text: Visiting from California and we needed a place to workout daily. Found this gym nearby and just 5 mins walking distance. This is a great small, but mighty gym. Friendly staff, clean and well maintained equipments. Thank you Sam and John for your friendly and professional service.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jasmin! We hope you enjoy your stay here :)

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been a member for almost a year now with royal oak as my home gym and it does feel like home. I've been to a lot of gyms but Anytime Fitness stands out as the most friendly, fun and challenging space there is. I cannot stress enough as to how good the environment is. Just showing up makes you want to work out and the crew is the friendliest of any gym I've ever come across in my life. I certainly did not go wrong by choosing Anytime Fitness and i know others feel the same as me. This is what fitness should look like. Challenging, exhausting, entertaining and fun.
featured_reviews.review_text: I've been a member for almost a year now with royal oak as my home gym and it does feel like home. I've been to a lot of gyms but Anytime Fitness stands out as the most friendly, fun and challenging space there is. I cannot stress enough as to how good the environment is. Just showing up makes you want to work out and the crew is the friendliest of any gym I've ever come across in my life. I certainly did not go wrong by choosing Anytime Fitness and i know others feel the same as me. This is what fitness should look like. Challenging, exhausting, entertaining and fun.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're so grateful to hear that we feel like home. Hope to see you soon! :D

featured_reviews.review_id:
I've been a member at anytime fitness in the past and each location has a different owner. I signed up for a trial pass after a few months off from my cancellation at another gym. When I came in, a younger male was helping me to activate the trial. I had received a text message saying the 7 day pass was no longer offered but a one day was available to claim. I decided to pass on the trial I booked in for and perhaps go another time. A few days later I got a text message offering a 7 day trial so my assumption that they were offering it to me since I wasn't coming in. The younger male at the front kept going back and forth and reading and explaining the text messages to me, not even doing anything to resolve or find a solution. Honestly, if he is looking to be a position of management in the future, making sure your guests are happy and feel taken cared for is the number one thing. The gym is a personal and intimate space and I was not happy with someone like that handling my account. He kept going back and forth and I literally said to him "honestly this is not my problem, what can we do about it". I told him either way a 1 day or a 7 day I'll take since I was already there. If it wasn't for Von I wouldn't even consider going to this location. Focus on learning conflict resolution instead of focusing on the problem and repeating it to the client thinking that it is the answer and will resolve it lol. Don't really need a male younger than me speaking to me like that but I'm patient enough to give people space to grow and learn, literally not my responsibility. The location is clean and quiet, I went around 2-3pm. They have a bag for Muay Thai

"I see we need to update our messaging system, I will check if we can honour the seven days but in the case we can't, is the one day trial for today okay with you?"
featured_reviews.review_text:

"I see we need to update our messaging system, I will check if we can honour the seven days but in the case we can't, is the one day trial for today okay with you?"
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Kelly! Thank you for your feedback. The team will be taking this as a learning experience to be able to give better customer service in the future. We have updated our system and hope that it will not cause confusion again in the future.

Hope you enjoy your 7 day pass! and have a great long weekend!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Mainly I come here for the convenience.  The gym itself is quite small and busy and the equipment while functioning properly, looks a bit worn.

There are better gyms for less price but I'm willing to sacrifice for convenience.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Mainly I come here for the convenience.  The gym itself is quite small and busy and the equipment while functioning properly, looks a bit worn.

There are better gyms for less price but I'm willing to sacrifice for convenience.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Alex! Our busiest hours are usually Mondays - Thursdays between 4:30pm and 8:30pm. Hope to see you again :)

featured_reviews.review_id:
Anytime is my 2nd home. Great facility with the equipment you need to get in a great workout. Clean and bright. Never a long wait for the equipment.

Von and the team are welcoming, friendly and create a great atmosphere!
featured_reviews.review_text:
Anytime is my 2nd home. Great facility with the equipment you need to get in a great workout. Clean and bright. Never a long wait for the equipment.

Von and the team are welcoming, friendly and create a great atmosphere!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ricky! We're so happy to have you here :) See you soon!

featured_reviews.review_id: I recently moved to Burnaby and was looking for a nice comfy gym to drop in for casual workouts. I tried GL and it was just too busy for me. When I visited AF, staffs helped me out for the transition and this place is so nice and chill. I didn't have to wait for an equipment at all so that's a win for me. Great location, friendly members, no horse plays, grunting, dropping weights, competitive pricing and friendly staffs. 10/10 would recommend.

Great location, friendly members, no horse plays, grunting, dropping weights, competitive pricing and friendly staffs. 10/10 would recommend.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Namgoong! We're so glad you're a part of our AF community :) We hope to see you more often here!

featured_reviews.review_id: Best gym ever. The staff are always so friendly and welcoming. Definitely a great place to get in a good workout and meet new people
featured_reviews.review_text: Best gym ever. The staff are always so friendly and welcoming. Definitely a great place to get in a good workout and meet new people
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Dayanara!! :) We're so glad you're a part of our gym community! See you soon!!!

featured_reviews.review_id: What I like about this location is that, first it's clean, the staffs are friendly and I did a personal training with coach Von,I'm surprised that he could tell how you want your training to be done. Either you want it hard or challenging or easy just by doing single consultation with him. Also they do have lockers that you don't need to bring your personal keys.
featured_reviews.review_text: What I like about this location is that, first it's clean, the staffs are friendly and I did a personal training with coach Von,I'm surprised that he could tell how you want your training to be done. Either you want it hard or challenging or easy just by doing single consultation with him. Also they do have lockers that you don't need to bring your personal keys.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Bien! We're so glad that you enjoyed your experience here at the gym and with Von :) Hope to see you soon!
